explains: v. 把……归于，归因于；委派；信任，正式认可；授权

sentences.en: They accredit these views to him.
sentences.cn: 他们认定这些是他的见解。

sentences.en: We accredit him with finding that book.
sentences.cn: 我们相信是他找到那本书的。

sentences.en: vt. We accredit the invention of the electric light to Adison.
sentences.cn: 我们把电灯的发明归功于爱迪生。
